        public static void convertFolderToXML(java.lang.String dir,
                      boolean recursive)
        Converts a folder's R2D files from binary to XML.
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory to start at in relation to the jar path
        recursive - If true, recursively searches any subdirectories for files to convert.

      • getRelativeFile

        public static java.io.File getRelativeFile(java.io.File absolute)
        Returns a relative file to the jar path, based on an absolute file.
        Parameters:
        absolute - An absolute file; in other words a file that is not relative to the jar path.
        Returns:
        A relative file to the game's jar folder.
